$$
\text{Area} = \frac{1}{2} \left| \sum_{i=1}^{n} (x_i y_{i+1} - x_{i+1} y_i) \right|
$$

Where $(x_{n+1}, y_{n+1})$ is the same as $(x_1, y_1)$ to complete the cycle.

We will now apply the formula to the given coordinates:
